POST APPLIED FOR TIG AND ARC WELDER 6G
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--------
CAREER  PROFILE
My position  is  Tig And Arc Welder 6g   I have experience in  CARBON
STEEL,LOW TEMPERATURE CARBON STEEL, COPPER NICKEL,STAINLES
STEEL,ALLOY  STEEL  metals(pipe  line)I  have  all  type  welding  repair  and
fabrication work. Specially Welding inspection, Fitting, Cutting, Grinding, jobs.
I am a ITI holder with 8thyears’ experience welder knowledge in various (Total
Safety), Confined space.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
NATURE OF WORK
PIPE WELDER- Tig and Arc and structure welder.
To be responsible for all types welding on piping, gas line crude line
piping section as well as flow dramatic line up, stand line up etc.
To be responsible of live line up section, material section or workshop
activity of welding.
I’m skilled to make all types of piping joints, v-joints, reducers, flow
line, skilled alignments. As well as making all types of joints
TYPE OF MATERIALS
CS & LTCS, SS, DSS, SDSS, COPPER NICKEL, ALLOY STEEL, etc.
E 6010, E 7018, E 7018-1, E 8018-B2, E 8018-C3, E 308L, E 316L, E 309L, E 2209
ER 70S-2, ER 70S-6, ER 80S-B2, ER 80S-NI 1, ER 308L, ER 316L, ER 309L, ER 2209
CERTIFICATE.
